name: Daily Commuter
description: Built for urban riders who depend on their bike every day. This schedule keeps your motorcycle reliable, efficient, and safe through heavy traffic, short trips, and all-weather use.

tasks.name: Engine Oil Change
tasks.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter to keep engine healthy during stop-and-go traffic.

tasks.name: Brake Fluid
tasks.description: Check and replace brake fluid to maintain braking performance in variable conditions.

tasks.name: Fork Oil
tasks.description: Inspect and replace fork oil to ensure smooth front-end performance and safety.

tasks.name: Brake Pads
tasks.description: Check pad wear and replace to maintain reliable stopping in urban riding.

tasks.name: Chain Clean/Lube
tasks.description: Clean and lubricate chain to prevent premature wear in all-weather commuting.

tasks.name: Chain Replacement
tasks.description: Inspect and replace chain and sprockets if worn to avoid drivetrain issues.

tasks.name: Air Filter
tasks.description: Clean or replace to ensure clean airflow in urban environments.

tasks.name: Coolant
tasks.description: Check and replace coolant to prevent overheating in traffic conditions.

tasks.name: Spark Plugs
tasks.description: Check and replace spark plugs for consistent performance and fuel efficiency.

tasks.name: Valve Clearance
tasks.description: Check and adjust valve clearance to avoid power loss and maintain engine health.

tasks.name: Tires
tasks.description: Check wear and pressure; replace when needed for safe commuting.

name: Sport & Track Rider
description: Designed for performance-focused riders who push their machines hard — whether carving canyons or chasing lap times. Prioritizes engine health, precise handling, and peak braking performance.

tasks.name: Engine Oil Change
tasks.description: Replace engine oil and oil filter with high-performance synthetic oil for high-revving engines.

tasks.name: Brake Fluid
tasks.description: Replace brake fluid with high-temperature DOT 4 to maintain hard braking performance.

tasks.name: Fork Oil
tasks.description: Replace fork oil and inspect seals to retain front-end sharpness and handling.

tasks.name: Brake Pads
tasks.description: Inspect and replace pads for consistent braking during aggressive riding or track days.

tasks.name: Chain Clean/Lube
tasks.description: Frequent cleaning and lubrication with performance lube to handle high torque loads.

tasks.name: Chain Tension
tasks.description: Check and adjust chain slack for maximum power delivery and safety.

tasks.name: Air Filter
tasks.description: Replace more often to ensure maximum airflow and throttle response.

name: Touring & Adventure Rider
description: Perfect for riders clocking long distances on highways or remote trails. This schedule emphasizes durability, comfort, and preparedness for extended travel in varied conditions.

tasks.name: Engine Oil Change
tasks.description: Use high-quality oil and change regularly to maintain engine health over long trips.

tasks.name: Brake Fluid
tasks.description: Replace fluid to ensure consistent braking performance on extended rides.

tasks.name: Fork Oil
tasks.description: Refresh fork oil to preserve front suspension performance during long travel.

tasks.name: Brake Pads
tasks.description: Inspect often and replace to ensure confident braking under load.

tasks.name: Chain Clean/Lube
tasks.description: Clean and lube chain after long rides, especially in dirt or rain.

tasks.name: Chain Replacement
tasks.description: Replace chain and sprockets to avoid failure far from home.

tasks.name: Air Filter
tasks.description: Replace more frequently if riding in dusty or remote environments.

tasks.name: Coolant
tasks.description: Change coolant regularly to prevent overheating on long rides.

tasks.name: Spark Plugs
tasks.description: Replace to ensure clean ignition on long-distance travel.

tasks.name: Valve Clearance
tasks.description: Check valve clearance before long trips to avoid performance loss.

tasks.name: Tires
tasks.description: Inspect and replace to avoid breakdowns far from services.

name: Cruiser & Chopper Rider
description: Tailored for laid-back riders who enjoy relaxed cruising and maintaining their machines. Focuses on longevity, vibration control, and keeping things running smooth and stylish.

tasks.name: Engine Oil Change
tasks.description: Use high-mileage or semi-synthetic oil; change regularly to protect large-displacement engines.

tasks.name: Brake Fluid
tasks.description: Replace fluid to preserve smooth brake feel and safety.

tasks.name: Fork Oil
tasks.description: Replace fork oil to preserve ride comfort and smooth cruising.

tasks.name: Brake Pads
tasks.description: Check pads during tire or oil changes; replace if worn.

tasks.name: Chain / Belt Maintenance
tasks.description: Clean chain or check belt condition; replace as needed.

tasks.name: Air Filter
tasks.description: Replace to maintain optimal engine tone and throttle response.

tasks.name: Spark Plugs
tasks.description: Change to preserve smooth idling and low-end torque.

tasks.name: Tires
tasks.description: Inspect for cracks or flat spots; replace to ensure safe cruising.

name: Standard / General Purpose Rider
description: A balanced maintenance schedule for riders who use their bike for a bit of everything — commuting, weekend rides, and occasional trips. Practical, dependable, and easy to follow.

tasks.name: Engine Oil Change
tasks.description: Regular oil and filter changes to suit a wide range of conditions.

tasks.name: Brake Fluid
tasks.description: Replace fluid every 2 years to ensure safe braking.

tasks.name: Fork Oil
tasks.description: Change fork oil to maintain stable front suspension.

tasks.name: Brake Pads
tasks.description: Inspect pads and replace when worn to maintain safety.

tasks.name: Chain Clean/Lube
tasks.description: Keep chain clean and lubed to extend its life.

tasks.name: Air Filter
tasks.description: Replace to maintain performance and fuel efficiency.

tasks.name: Spark Plugs
tasks.description: Replace to ensure reliable starting and engine smoothness.

tasks.name: Tires
tasks.description: Inspect tread and pressure often; replace as needed.
